questions.question_text: An organization is planning a project to replace several complex manual controls with automated processes. Which of the following is the risk practitioner's MOST important course of action?

choices.C: Establish the degree of control efficiency improvement.
choices.B: Determine whether the automated processes adequately address the risk.
choices.D: Update the associated control assessments for the automated processes.
choices.A: Test the automated processes to ensure results are accurate.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Determine whether the automated processes adequately address the risk.

Before proceeding with the implementation of automated processes, it is crucial to assess whether the new controls effectively address the risks that the manual controls were designed to mitigate. This involves understanding the risk landscape, evaluating how the new automated processes impact risk, and ensuring that the intended risk reduction is achieved.

While other actions, such as testing the automated processes for accuracy (Option A), establishing the degree of control efficiency improvement (Option C), and updating control assessments for the automated processes (Option D), are important steps in the overall process, determining the adequacy of the automated processes in addressing the underlying risks is foundational to the success of the risk management effort.

questions.question_text: A risk assessment of an organization’s architecture reveals that the middleware systems have a severe vulnerability that could compromise the confidentiality of record processing. Which of the following is the risk practitioner's BEST course of action?

choices.D: Document the issue in the business impact analysis (BIA).
choices.C: Escalate the issue to senior management.
choices.A: Recommend additional budget to cover the cost of an upgrade.
choices.B: Develop a remediation plan with the business process owner.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Develop a remediation plan with the business process owner.

Developing a remediation plan in collaboration with the business process owner is a proactive and strategic approach.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is MOST important when planning to implement a Software as a Service (SaaS) application to manage information?

choices.D: Obtaining the service provider’s controls attestation
choices.B: Assessing if adequate deconversion services are available

A. Determining if sensitive data will be included

questions.question_text: Which of the following is MOST important for the organization to consider before implementing a new in-house developed artificial intelligence (AI) solution?

choices.C: Increase the scale for measuring impact due to threat materialization.
choices.D: Inform the board of potential risk scenarios associated with aggressive business strategies.
choices.A: Update risk awareness training to reflect current levels of risk appetite and tolerance.
choices.B: Identify new threats resulting from the new business strategy.

discussion.content: I believe the answer is B, risk practitioner need to Identify the risks first then he can report to the board.

Selected Answer: B
B. Identify new threats resulting from the new business strategy.

The introduction of a new strategy can bring about new risks and uncertainties that need to be identified and assessed. By understanding the potential threats, the organization can develop effective risk mitigation and management strategies to support the successful implementation of the aggressive business strategy.
